text: Olympia Fields is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States. The population was 4,718 at the 2020 census. The municipality grew up around the prestigious Olympia Fields Country Club, originally established in 1915. Olympia Fields is one of the richest and best educated, majority African- American, communities in the United States. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
title: Olympia Fields, Illinois
